Title: Parasyte: Part 1
Writer: Hitoshi Iwaaki (manga), Ryôta Kosawa (screenplay), Sean Whitley, Takashi Yamazaki (screenplay)
Actors: Shôta Sometani, Eri Fukatsu, Ai Hashimoto, Kazuki Kitamura
Plot: The humanity is suffering from murders all over the globe, called "Mincemeat murders". High school student, Izumi Shinichi has a parasite living off him, having replaced his right hand, and he might be the discoverer of truth.
